trans-unit.source: Creates a Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) signature.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter"></xref> class with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureFormatter"> </xref> klass med den angivna nyckeln.

trans-unit.source: The instance of the Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: Instansen av den digitala signaturalgoritmen (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) som innehåller nyckeln.

trans-unit.source: Creates the Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) PKCS #1 signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Skapar algoritmen Digital signatur (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) PKCS #1 signatur för angivna data.

trans-unit.source: The resulting signature data can be verified by using <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Resulterande signaturdata kan verifieras med hjälp av <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSASignatureDeformatter.VerifySignature%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital signature for the specified data.
trans-unit.target: Den digitala signaturen för angivna data.

trans-unit.source: The OID is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The OID is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The DSA key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - eller - det DSA-nyckeln är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the hash algorithm for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: Anger den hash-algoritmen för algoritmen Digital signatur (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) signaturformateraren.

trans-unit.source: The name of the hash algorithm to use for the signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på den hash-algoritmen som ska användas för signaturformateraren.

trans-unit.source: The strName parameter does not map to the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Den strName parametern överensstämmer inte med den hash-algoritm.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the key to be used for the Digital Signature Algorithm (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) signature formatter.
trans-unit.target: Anger nyckeln som ska användas för Digital signatur-algoritmen (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref>) signaturformateraren.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"></xref> that holds the key.
trans-unit.target: Instansen av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DSA"> </xref> som innehåller nyckeln.
